Class Binder

java.lang.Object
CardHolder
Binder
Direct Known Subclasses:
CollectorBinder, NonCuratedBinder, SellableBinder
public abstract class Binder extends CardHolder
Base Binder class (extending CardHolder) with common binder functionality. Now includes validation hooks for subclasses.
